name: Thesynonymgame
0:
”Alexa, open synonym game”
”Alexa, start synonym game”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: synonym game
des: There are 10 flashcards about synonyms in this quiz. You can review the flash cards and then test your knowledge. At any point you can say "Alexa, review mode" to switch to review or say "Alexa, test mode" to start a test. You can say "Alexa, next" to move to the next card. At any point during the test, you can say "Alexa, what's my score" to get your current test score.
priv: Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
